title: Peaceful  1 bedroom cabin with open floor plan and large garage
posting_body: This is the perfect quiet and peaceful setting in nature on about an acre, while not far from highway 285.
While spending the weekend preparing and putting on a fresh paint on the entire home and garage, there were several deer coming in the yard with lovely Aspen trees.
The house is small, but very charming and open living quarters.
The ceilings are vaulted in the living space giving a large and open feeling with a wood burning stove that is open to the kitchen.
Although only 720 square feet it feels much larger for the footprint.
The bedroom upstairs is large enough for a kingsize bed.
There is a large 2 car 644 sq. foot garage attached to the house and can be used to enter house.
Perfect for a single or a couple.
Please text or call to arrange a showing or for questions
